Parameter.Title: Restore state after power failure
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines if the device will return to state prior to the power failure after power is restored. Available settings: 0 – the device does not save the state prior to the power failure and returns to "off" position 1 – the device restores its state prior to the power failure

Parameter.Title: Backlight Enabled
Parameter.Description: This parameter allows defines if the back light is enabled Available settings: 0 – Disabled 1 – Enabled

Parameter.Title: LED Indicates Off State
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines if the LED displays ping when the light is off Available settings: 0 – Disabled - No illumination 1 – Enabled - Pink or Green colour when switch off

Parameter.Title: Root Device Controlled Settings
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines which end point is mapped to the root device (Endpoint 0) Available settings: 1 – Endpoint 1 is mapped to root endpoint 2 – Endpoint 2 is mapped to root endpoint 3 – Both endpoints are mapped to root endpoint

Parameter.Title: Faceplate Buttons Enabled
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines if the buttons on teh face plate are enabled. Available settings: 0 – Disabled 1 – Enabled

Parameter.Title: Timer Enabled
Parameter.Description: This parameter determines if the timer is enabled Available settings: 0 – Disabled 1 – Enabled

Parameter.Title: Channel 1 Time Duration Setting
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines how long the light on Channel 1 is on for when parameter 6 is enabled The value defines the number of minutes

Parameter.Title: Channel 2 Time Duration Setting
Parameter.Description: This parameter defines how long the light on Channel 2 is on for when parameter 6 is enabled The value defines the number of minutes
